The Waters at Hammond.review_text: Went and toured this place with 2 of my friends today. Was always throughly pleased and impressed with The Waters when I visited some friends who lived here last year. Rebecca Elliot was extremely kind and very knowledgeable when welcoming us in, presenting leasing options, and giving us a tour of the place. Very excited to be moving in here 2 months from now. Very clean, still has that brand new feel, and a very fresh and welcoming community space. This definitely will be the nicest rental property I‚Äôve ever stayed at. Without a doubt the best apartment space to rent in Hammond, LA.
Beautiful Resort style location staff is 5 star maintenance are always on time. Pool and game room is very enjoyable nice clean always available for use. Love the ability to get Starbucks.

I went on a apartment tour for The Waters at Hammond and had the honor of the exceptional Ms. Kamryn as my tour guide. I had a wonderful experience on my tour and Ms. Kamryn was very helpful in answering all of my questions.

My friend and I were in the search of apartments in the Hammond, Louisiana area and fell in love with the positive and peaceful environment of The Waters at Hammond apartment complex. I am writing this review today because I would like to give a personal shoutout to Ms. Kamryn because she helped us choose The Waters as our new home.

Throughout our time researching the Waters, Ms. Kamryn has always made herself available for questions and concerns. She knew we were new to the apartment searching process and helped us feel more comfortable and at ease. Overall, Ms. Kamryn has done an amazing job helping us and I thank her for her excellent customer service.
Great views and the BEST amenities. Staff is always so helpful and very knowledgeable. love living at this complex.

I have lived here at the waters for two years. The staff go above and beyond. The property is always clean and welcoming. My girls love going for walks around the pond and to the park. The neighbors are wonderful. Sitting on the patio, the passing neighbors always speak. I love that it‚Äôs pet friendly. I hate pets inside my apartment but my kids love being on the patio or walking and see others walking their dogs. Chris, Erika, and Charlie feel like extended family. (They are who you meet in the office) Maintenance guys are great ! Any problem big or small they are on the way asap to find and fix the issue.

DO NOT MOVE HERE!!!

Please don‚Äôt move here! They will mess your credit history up! They don‚Äôt answer the phone and if  they need to contact you Regarding your apartment for any financial reasons they will just send everything to the collection agency! Now I‚Äôm dealing with an eviction on my credit after I paid the buy out of the lease. I was never contacted until months later and even then they charged me with the wrong amounts of things that were over charged! I will be getting my lawyer involved because this is unacceptable.

PLEASE DO NOT RENT FROM HERE!

I would highly recommend The Waters at Hammond.  Beautiful property and great staff, from the office to the maintenance crew.  I do visit friends who live there and have enjoyed the pool and gym area many times last year.  The courtesy/police officer on site seems to be on top of her job (from what I have seen and heard).
About the courtesy/police officer (since I‚Äôve seen some bad reviews about her)‚Ä¶
I have witnessed her or her along with staff doing pool checks to make sure people are following the rules/policies of the property.  Two people per apartment seems to be a little strict but at the same time I understand there are over 300 apartments there.  It is good to know there are not a lot of outside people taking up all the space in the amenity areas (like some places may have).  I have spoken to her, and she seems to be as fair as a person can be.  Her motto: ‚ÄúRead your lease, follow the rules and respect your neighbors‚Äù.  What more could you ask for?  My friends say that she enforces the rules no matter what your race is and as fair as possible.  So, on the negative comments, I ask myself... Were they following the rules/policies?
About the negative comments, how many people read their lease COMPLETELY?  If they read what they were signing, then they would know the rules/policies of what they can and cannot do.

Very rude courtesy officer. We made a simple mistake of misreading a sign and being in the pool 18 minutes after it closed and the ‚Äúcourtesy officer‚Äù barged in through the gate in a robe with no identification yelling at us demanding our unit number and personal information. After explaining it was a human mistake of misreading a sign from not using the pool often she continued yelling and demanding personal information and wasn‚Äôt providing any credentials and made us feel very unsafe. She is a very angry individual and regardless of us trying to repeatedly explain it being a human mistake and saying we were leaving immediately she kept yelling and said we ‚Äúdidn‚Äôt know how to read‚Äù.  it made us feel very unsafe even walking back because we didn‚Äôt know if she was following. Verbally insulting tenants for a 18 minute mistake and harassment isn‚Äôt necessary. Will not be using this amenity again.

I don't usually do these kinds of things so excuse me for being a little too excited!

As someone who's lived at not so friendly and accommodating properties in the past, I thought I would never find the right apartment complex to call home :( Well that all changed the second The Waters entered the arena. They blew me away with how friendly the staff was and above all else their commitment to the assurance of safety and comfort that everyone wants in their home.

Anytime I had a problem, a friendly voice was waiting on the other line to help. I almost wish I had more problems just so I can be blown away again by how quickly and efficiently my worries were dissolved.

The amenities are just the cherry on top as well when it comes to the experience at The Waters. The pool is always calling my name like a mermaid singing its song to attract wandering seamen. Unfortunately due to my fear of the ocean, I've never actually swam in the pool but have enjoyed numerous days poolside with friends and fellow neighbors.

I would highly recommend giving this property a chance. Even if it's out of the way, it's worth making the trip. Even if you don't sign a lease, you'll still leave with a smile on your face. We need smiles more than ever in today's world.
I moved in a few weeks ago and just have been blown away. You can tell they really care about their residents!

I recently moved to The Waters at Hammond and have been blown away by my living experience here. The grounds are impeccably maintained, with beautiful landscaping that makes me feel like I'm living in a resort. The staff are friendly and helpful, always available to answer any questions or concerns I have.

But what really sets this apartment complex apart is the maintenance crew. They are top-notch, always quick to respond to any issues and incredibly skilled at what they do. They take great pride in their work, and it shows - my apartment always looks and feels brand new.

Overall, I can't recommend The Waters at Hammond highly enough. If you're looking for a beautiful, well-maintained, and comfortable living experience in Louisiana, this is the place to be.

I have lived at The Waters at Hammond for almost two years. The staff is so helping & caring. The apartment grounds are kept clean & I always feel safe here. A special shout-out to the leasing consultant, Charlie, for always going above and beyond to help our residents! :)

The office goes above and beyond for their residents. They are extremely caring. Anytime I had an issue the maintenance team fixed it promptly (usually within a day). They are extremely dog friendly. I 100% recommend this as your home!!

VISITORS BEWARE!

Early on the morning of April 7th, I had arrived to the Waters to visit some friends after working all night. It was extremely busy in the parking lot with not many available parking spots. I cam up to an area that had a few and backed my truck into the spot. It was a covered section, but I did not think anything of it due to the fact that there were no signs out to inform guests where they can not park. Three hours later, I go to leave and notice my truck is no-where to be found and the office is closed. I had to track down who took my truck and try to understand why. My truck had been taken to Independence, LA. The tow-truck driver told me he has personally walked into the office and told them to put signs out warning people where they can and can not park. He is frequently called out to this complex because it is such a common occurrence. There was no indicator that someone specifically owned this spot.

I called this morning to inquire about some of the rules and regulations of these spots and was informed by Taylor that whoever "owns" this spot can have anyone towed away without the office being involved. She also stated that she thinks they have some signs out but is not sure where they are located. When I spoke to Taylor this afternoon, she blandly stated three times that she understands my frustrations but there is nothing for them to do as if she really did not care.

I have never been towed before because I always check to make sure I am in a safe parking spot where there are no signs warning me otherwise. But this place seems to think everyone is going to automatically know that some select spots are owned by other residents. They absolutely do not care about visitors, and while the property is lovely, I do not care to ever return nor recommend this place to anyone due to poor management.

most amazing location, apts are stunning! I had an amazing time tour with Schmidt and Met some of the other team members who almost feel like family! My Move in was seamless and one of the maintenance guys even helped me get stuff out of my car! been here a little over a month and I could not be happier! Love it Here

My experience living at The Waters has been wonderful. The property is well maintained and the staff is always friendly. I‚Äôm thankful for Schmidt in the front office because she went the extra mile to make sure this place would be everything I wanted! Love my home.

I‚Äôve lived here for 8 months now and I love it. Everything is beautiful and clean and the front office staff are super friendly and helpful. Ms. Schmidt is the one who toured me and she couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful‚Ä¶ helped me find the perfect apartment! I absolutely love living here, and parking has been a breeze. I would highly recommend this complex.
Hands down the nicest, best kept grounds I‚Äôve seen at an apartment complex! Very clean and welcoming. Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. Can‚Äôt recommend The Waters enough!

My experience living at The Waters has been amazing. The property is always gorgeous. The fact that there is a carwash here is so convenient. I‚Äôm so grateful for Schmidt in the front office. She went above and beyond, and I couldn‚Äôt be more happy with my home.

Place is very nice and the workers are excellent especially Charlie farmer I highly suggest requesting him! He helped me get an apartment so fast.. his work effort is amazing. Charlie is the best and most professional person highly recommend getting an apartment here!!

The waters, are the most beautifully decorated apartment complex I‚Äôve ever come across! And the staff was even more amazing and accommodating especially with all my questions! Luke Bentivegna was the one who REALLY stood out to me he was very understanding and was super confident in his answers and reassurance of the knowledge of the building and the residents due to my past experiences else where! Keep up the great job you guys ü•∞

The staff at The Waters has absolutely amazing customer service! Everyone here is eager & happy to help you! The complex is very clean and had a welcoming & cozy atmosphere. Definitely looking forward to living here!
These balconies offer breathtaking views to Watch the Sunrise!

This place is just okay. When I first moved in everyone was overly nice and attentive & communicative, but now since I‚Äôve moved in, they are impossible to reach, never answer the phone, do not call you back, never respond to emails, which is all extremely unprofessional. People park in my designated spot which I have to pay for monthly, the gates are always broken and unauthorized people enter in which causes issues. Management procrastinates and you have to constantly call them for weeks to get a response. Now the valet trash is a huge issue, they outsource it & find the cheapest company who skip your unit never pick up your trash & the residents are STILL charged $50 fees even if it wasn‚Äôt your fault the people skipped your unit. Even though residents complain about this (and management even admitted they receive several complaints) nothing is done. Valet trash is not optional, you have to pay for it, even if they don't pick it up. This is a total waste of money. And, they don‚Äôt waive the $50 fee on your account regardless of how many times you call to get it resolved. They are completely unprofessional!  Do not move here, there are other places that are much more affordable & worth it. 2,000/month is not worth all of this.
The Waters at Hammond is such a beautiful property! The office staff are always kind and the maintenance team response in a timely manner. We love them!

This was the most beautiful property I‚Äôve ever stopped by. Not only was it gorgeous but staff were professional and courteous. They made me feel welcomed and cared for. I toured and snacks were provided. I unfortunately couldn‚Äôt rent due to a last minute relocation but this place would be anyones dream home!

I wish I could give this place zero stars. The leasing consultants are awful. They are unprofessional, lack problem solving skills, and are non-communicative.  I have never experienced such nasty customer service.

Perfect location and team provides top notch service. The maintenance team was always on top of any issues, which we rarely had.  The management team has been very kind, and we are sad to leave, but we are relocating for work.  We recently had the opportunity to meet a new team member, Chris M, who was a pleasure getting to know.  THANK YOU!

The staff is VERY friendly, very professional and answer any questions you may have.  I can not wait to be apart of this community (couple more weeks).  The property is very beautiful considering it is still under construction. They have done a great job at keeping construction separate from the community that is finished.
Great job!!!

Brand new and the management is amazing! Very friendly and always willing to help the best way they possibly can! The property is beautiful and well maintained. Maintenance is top notch and have great work ethic and personality!

The Waters at Hammond is absolutely beautiful. All of the staff members are wonderful. The Waters at Hammond does a great job addressing the needs and concerns of all of the tenants in a very timely manner.
The staff here are excellent. They really seem to care about the customer's needs and are very accommodating. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy apartment.

love living here. clean, staff is amazing and Schmidt who toured me never steered me wrong and helped me find the perfect apt!! Just love living here and parking has been a breeze! Thanks again so much!

I loved the brand new apartments! Very well maintained and nice amenities. One of the staff members named Luke showed me around, he was polite and very professional. I would recommend these beautiful apartments to anyone.
I loved the pool and it was amazing to have so many community events, Charlie was fun to talk too and super helpful! I look forward to applying to the Lafayette location whenever it‚Äôs finished!

The Water's is not just an apartment complex, it is a nice little community. When my life was turned upside down, they went above and beyond to help me get into an apartment fast. Dawson, Schmidt, and Charlie are absolutely the best. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you.

I highly recommend the Water's if you are looking for a place to call home.
Amazing place overall! The staff, neighbors, community. Would highly recommend this as your next home. Met some of the best people here!
I visited The Waters in Hammond & was immediately impressed with the outdoor maintenance. The apartments were roomy, updated & fabulous & even spoke to a couple of friendly staffers.

This is the nicest apartment complex I have ever lived in. I truly forget that I am not in a house. The staff is great, and the grounds are kept up so beautifully.  I‚Äôm so happy I can call The Water home!!

Our home is the best. I have lived in many apartments but this place out shines them all. The office staff is always willing to answer all my questions and address any concerns I have. I would give this a 10 if I could! We are not leaving anytime soon.
The waters at hammond is a beautiful community. I‚Äôm so grateful that Schmidt was able to give a great tour and help me find the best home. She was so kind and considerate!
I love the staff at the Waters! Shoutout to Charlie at the front desk who went above and beyond and was incredibly sweet,  friendly and accommodating!!
I HIGHLY recommend The Waters! Staff is OUTSTANDING always with great service in a timely manner.  My personal favorite are all the amenities on site!

The property is super nice and the staff responded quickly when I inquired about leasing. Nice girl named Schmidty gave me a tour and answered every question I could think of. Definitely consider this place as your next home.

I am disappointed at the inhumane, callous way the ‚Äúcommunity‚Äù manager and the property director handled a repeated plumbing issue.  Raw sewage backed up into the apartment 4 times in 3 weeks.  Maintenance poured bleach on the feces in the tub.  Plumbers removed a blue cap that they stated was left during construction.  She asked for November rent to be waived and for them to replace her contaminated belongings . They told her they would give $500 off ‚Äúin good faith‚Äù  and to use her renters insurance Bc  ‚Äúthat‚Äôs what it‚Äôs for‚Äù. They refuse to take responsibility, and the disregard for human life is 1000 times more disgusting than the feces that was piled in the tub!!!

the waters at hammond has been the best complex overall that i‚Äôve lived at. from the management, to the pool, the community events & even the quick maintenance‚Ä¶ i would recommend living here for anyone who is even considering the waters!!
The Waters is a very nice place to live. Great amenities, good community, and many perks onsite such as car wash and pet wash station!

These apartments are beautiful!!!!  Lots of amenities that make this place a wonderful place to live.  Starbucks coffee, gym, pool!!  üòç Also the staff is amazing... willing to go far and beyond to make the process easy.
The Waters is a beautiful complex! The staff are so pleasant and Mr. Mitch Magyar is very attentive and helpful.
My best friends son Luke Bentivegna lives and works here.  He showed me around and all I can say is this place is beautiful!! Keep up the good work!!!
The best apartment complex in Hammond, Louisiana! üè∞‚ú® I always go there for the free car wash! üöó #Hammond #Louisiana #FreeCarWash
Beautiful property, great amenities, friendly staff and residents. Love the gatherings that help connect with our neighbors. Great location, lots of restaurants and shopping near by.

I loved the apartment complex my mother-in-law lives in thought she was very safe and happy until yesterday..as we went to visit and spend family time with her ..as we were so embarrassed by the police woman to ask to leave..and take a BBQ inside..was not appropriate..I know complexes have their rules and regulations but it was only about 8 people but the police officer said you can only have 2 guests per household that's crazy..And aslo we ask her about others that were out there .but we were the only ones that had to leave..bad business.. and I also know a couple of people that live there that have a two-bedroom apartment with 5 people living in it.. so what about their guests ..5 people/2.. guests per person.. really..
I have just recently moved her and it was unbelievable how helpful the staff was and how beautiful the place is. The apartment is amazing and all that come with it is unmatched
Well kept property and staff was extremely helpful. We decided to buy instead of renting again. Definitely recommend.
Looking to move south. Checked out this very beautiful property! Christopher the leasing agent answered any questions or concerns we had. He was very informative and professional.
This place is amazing!! Absolutely nice staff here and are always making sure if we need anything. Love it here and hope other people do too!
Very wonderful place, loved the layouts of the bedrooms. The lady who gave me a tour was named Schmidt very sweet, very knowledgeable. I think this would be a wonderful place for me and my friend.
I would highly recommend the complex. The pool, the clubhouse, the grounds and the parking we're all well kept. I very much look forward to using the pool as the weather warms up.
Beautiful property,  maintenance was quick. Overall well run complex. Love the monthly events and swag!
Yeah I love the maintenance at the waters Hammond everything is clean up the date very nice the manager Mitchell is very kind
The Waters in Hammond is a very beautiful place. Very well maintained and the yards are cleaned. This is definitely the best place to rent in Hammond.
Visited friends here and loved the floor plans.  Wonderful amenities and beautiful finishes in the apartment.  ‚≠êÔ∏è
Loved the property! That Chris Magboo fellow really helped us out. He made the whole search process go over very smoothly.
Love the apartments! I walked into the leasing office and felt so invited by the leasing team. Dawson and Schmidt answered all my questions that I had and I can‚Äôt wait to live here!
The waters at Hammond is a great property! The staff is friendly and maintenance requests get taken care of quickly and efficiently!
I have enjoyed living here so much! They have the best amenities I have ever seen at any apartment complex in Hammond and the apartments are stunning!
Very hospitable and accommodating staff. Clean space with a great pool area and game room!
Very nice  apartment complex buildings, very nice community with many amenities to offer. Looking forward to explore everything it offers. Thank you!
The whole process went smooth and the waters team at the Hammond location was very nice and helpful. They made me feel welcomed.
I love the community, the staff, and my favorite amenity is the pool table in the 24/7 gameroom! 10/10 would recommend!
Looking for a place and can‚Äôt wait to see this one. The place seems so clean and well maintained‚Ä¶I love the swimming pool‚Ä¶ see you soon!
The place looks great! I would love to live there just by the picture!
Beautiful property and outstanding staff.  Easy access to surrounding businesses and Downtown Hammond.  Overall great location and staff!
Amazing staff maintenance is always quick to respond and the office staff are all super nice best complex I've lived in

VERY PREJUDICE!!!!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APARTMENT COMPLEX TO MY WORST ENEMY! THE VERY OWN ‚ÄúPROTECTION‚Äù THAT IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE TENANTS WELL BEING THEIR TOP PRIORITY, OR THE PATROL POLICE ON DUTY, IS A RAGING STALKER AND WILL NOT LEAVE ME ALONE. I HAVE HAD MULTIPLE ENCOUNTERS IN WHICH SHE HAS VIDEO RECORDED MY UNIT AND ACCUSED ME OF HORRENDOUS ACTS THAT HAVE BEEN PROVEN UNTRUE. SHE HAS TAKEN PICTURES OF MY GUEST AGAINST THEIR WILL ALONG WITH PICTURES OF THEIR VEHICLES. ALSO, SHE HAS BEEN CAUGHT TAKING PICTURES INSIDE OF MY GUEST‚ÄôS VEHICLES. THE APARTMENT COMPLEX‚ÄôS MANAGER IS VERY RUDE. SHE REFERS TO PEOPLE WITH SUCH A DISGUSTING ATTITUDE AND NO REMORSE FOR HUMAN DECENCY AND RESPECT. 0/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
This property is absolutely beautiful!! The amenities are phenomenal! They have really thought of everything!
Nicest apartments I have ever lived in. Everyone is extremely helpful and friendly!
Beautiful new property in a great location! Staff is top notch! Seriously stunning property!
Had to do a delivery here. Only problem incurred was finding the location on GPS. Other than that it is a very nice and clean complex.
The staff is courteous and helpful. The complex is well maintained and beautiful.
Great place to call home... even if for a short time! Staff and crew go over and above.  Will be forever grateful to them all.
I love that this property is gated and has a courtesy officer! Dawson was amazing! So polite & respectful.
Very well maintained and everything has been extremely smooth so far!  Love it!
Beautiful complex. Lovely amenities. Everything you want in an apartment. I wish I could afford to live there.
The staff was so knowledgeable and attentive on my tour. Beautiful complex and right next to Hammond Square!
Chris is the man! Extremely helpful through the entire leasing process, and just a great guy all the way around!
Beautiful property and Christopher was an amazing tour guide!! Can‚Äôt wait to move in
Absolutely beautiful property and the staff is super friendly! I highly recommend!!!
Amazing photos! The atmosphere definitely makes for a luxurious place.
Love my new apartment and the staff here have been great.
The grounds are beautifully kept. Would recommend. Must see.
This is the best place ever! It‚Äôs beautiful and the staff is amazing!
Friendly staff, great amenities and beautiful property!!
Beautiful facility with several amenities for their residents!
Very pretty property. The staff is extremely knowledgeable and helpful as well!
Absolutely beautiful place and great staff! Chris is amazing!
Beautiful place, great staff, Luke did great job helping me
Called for details‚Ä¶ office staff and Erika Carrizales were extremely professional, knowledgeable, and courteous!
Great location!! We love the playground! :)
The property is gorgeous! Toured with Schmidt, and she was so helpful!
Love the waters! The vibe here is great and I love all the amenities
This place is beautiful! Best staff around! 10/10 recommend!
Nicest apartments I‚Äôve ever been to or lived at!
Incredible staff and property! Could not recommend this location more!
Christopher was really nice and super helpful and gave lots of tips for the apartment
Awesome community, very clean and staff friendly.
The property is wonderful! I really enjoyed touring with Schmidt!
Great, very clean complex!  Friendly staff
Hannah as wonderful answering all my questions plus more. This is absolutely the perfect place to live.
Very friendly leasing team and beautiful property !
The staff was very informative and the property was absolutely beautiful.
If I could give this place 0 stars I would. Horrible communication and I was lied to and documents were illegally handled.
Beautiful place well kept and super clean.
Online photos look great‚Ä¶ will call with any questions
LOVE living here!
Lovely property and a great team of people!
Great family environment, clean and looks beautiful.
The team was very nice and answered all the questions I had.
Inquired about property found online‚Ä¶ great customer service
Stunning property and the most helpful and kind staff!
The property is beautiful and the staff was very helpful!
It's a great complex and great staff!
The BEST staff & living in Hammond! It‚Äôs AWESOMENESS
Wonderful complex.  The maintenance dept is on top of everything.
Beautiful place great staff great service great support
The staff at The Waters are professional and very nice to work with!
Great community to live in and the maintenance team is great
Beautiful place and all employees are outstanding and helpful.
Lovely staff who is willing to help with great facilitie!
Great place, great people, great times!
Such a beautiful property and the management is amazing!!!!
Property is amazing and office staff is great!

love it here!! definitely recommend

The Flats at East Bay.review_text: Connie is the absolute best! Not only does she keep the property clean and beautiful, she has quickly become the best part of my morning walk with my dog, Maverick! Connie and the staff here at the Flats make an intentional effort to be true friends to the tenants & their pets! üíõ

I love living at the Flats of East Bay. I particularly love the staff! Jima is on staff and she is always busy working, keeping up with the clubhouse, taking care of residents needs and she couldn't be more professional and kind! She is truly an asset to your team!
Beautiful complex, kept clean by the best crew around, Jima & Connie! Alyson and Chelsea in leasing make you feel at home with their kindness and understanding.
Caring staff. Connie and Jima keep everything so beautiful and maintenance is always quick to fix things. Recommend living here to everyone, you cannot beat these amenities.

The Staff was very accommodating when I changed my move-in date and was helpful in finding the right apartment in the complex that would be best suited for me.  Been here a couple of months and enjoying my new home.

The best place to live with best people. Kind, caring staff who go out of their way to make it a wonderful place to live. Blane is so knowledgeable and friendly, and just makes the front office such a warm, welcoming place to be. Chelsea personally helped me get through the application and move in process, and does so much to make the Flats community beautiful and welcoming. Allyson is a treasure and cares deeply about the residents and their experience here. Chase-in maintenance- is so kind and helpful. Any slight maintenance issue has always been handled in such a timely and efficient manner. I cant say enough about how much I love living here, because the people who work here seem to care so much about the residents feelng at home. It's affordable, pristine, safe and cozy. I'm truly grateful everyday to have landed here.

The move in process was super easy thanks to all the help from Blaine and Chelsea! They communicated exactly what paperwork I needed on move in day. On move in day I had all my paperwork and Chelsea set everything up for me and put all the apps on my phone I needed and set them up so I didn‚Äôt have to. Chelsea did everything for me and I had keys to my new place in less than 15 minutes! The staff is amazing and keep this place clean and looking brand new. The residents are super friendly and everyone is so nice. So glad I picked the flats at east bay!

From the beginning Chelsea stayed in contact answering any questions I had making sure this was an easy move. The property is beautiful & everyone has been extremely helpful & kind. Special thanks to Mrs. Lorese for moving a good bit of my furniture in my apartment before my arrival which was no easy task & for being the absolute sweetest. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to call home.

I have had a really positive experience living here! The staff is incredibly helpful and receptive. The grounds are beautiful and well kept. It feels secluded while also being in close proximity to grocery stores and restaurants. I HIGHLY recommend moving here. A majority of the people I have met are from the area so it truly does feel like home.

I‚Äôve been here for two weeks and I have to say the staff has been incredible and welcoming. The place is absolutely picture perfect and clean. Chelsea has gone above and beyond to make me feel welcome and comfortable. I have lived in many apartment complexes and this one is by far is the best.

I absolutely love living here. The property managers, Alyson and Chelsea are  responsive, attentive, understanding an have high standards for the property they manage. Connie the grounds keeper is so personable, outgoing and keeps the aesthetics of the property looking beautiful!!   I really do love living here!

My wife and I have been here since day one.  From leasing to move in to all the amenities and events held for tenants, it's been wonderful.  Blaine, our leasing agent is great.  Chelsey, the assistant property manager has always been very communitivcive about any issues we may have, Chase, Jimma, Connie and Allyson have also been exceptionally friendly and helpful.  Fairhope has needed a quality and affordable apartment complex and the Flats has filled that void.
Lived here for 6 months! No issues. Everything is wonderful!!!! The staff is great. Highly recommend!

The Flats at East Bay is an absolutely wonderful apartment complex to live at. I moved in during the month of January and have had nothing but a positive experience with Alyson, Chelsea, and Blane. All staff, including the maintenance man, Anthony, are kind, thoughtful, and relatable. I highly recommend living here. It is a beautiful place and definitely somewhere you can call your home.

Fantastic place to live.  Well lighted for safety.  Staff is very friendly and I found all the neighbors to be very nice.  Pet friendly.  All the amenities are 1st class.  Highly recommend this for those who like apartment life.

I recently had the pleasure of touring The Flats at East Bay, and I must commend Blane for an outstanding experience. Even though I haven't made a decision yet, Blane's professionalism, knowledge, and friendly demeanor during the tour were exceptional. His willingness to answer questions and provide detailed information left a positive impression, making my apartment search a truly enriching experience. If my leasing journey continues at The Flats at East Bay, I'm confident that Blane's excellent service will play a significant role in my decision-making process.

This was my second tour, and both times Blane made it not only enjoyable but also profoundly insightful, especially when touring a unit.

Touring several apartments in the area, The Flats at East Bay has certainly made an impression and stood out. Blane‚Äôs dedication to providing exceptional service has truly set this community apart in the apartment search. Thanks again, Blane, for another meaningful and informative tour experience!

I absolutely love living in this condominium! It's a tranquil oasis with beautiful surroundings and top-notch amenities. The staff is incredibly attentive and friendly, always ensuring a pleasant experience. Living here is truly a delight!

So far so good. Blain checked us in and was kind and efficient.  He helped both of us set our Brivo pass and Active Building accounts.  We had a couple of issues with the apartment which were resolved immediately. One was a user error as regarding the foot plate going out to the deck which was explained to us by a very knowledgeable and  personable  service person, so all good. Thanks to all of you!
What a wonderful complex. The staff is exceptional. The grounds are always clean. The crew is so friendly and works very hard!

The Flats really stood out during my apartment hunt. I highly recommend this complex. The extras you get‚Ä¶ gym, pool, fire pits, are so amazing. Pretty property and kind people (I met with Alyson, she was great and super helpful. Best complex I‚Äôve ever lived.

I absolutely love this property!  I am so excited to move in in January!  The location of this property is so perfect for me and my fiance.  Could not have asked for a better home for us, and I am so grateful for Blane and his help.

What a beautiful property.  Met with Chelsea Coker. She was very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. She immediately made me feel welcome and like family. I can‚Äôt wait to move in to my new apartment and my new community.

Love my new apartment and can't wait to make use of all of  the amenities .
Everyone is so nice and neighbors  are quiet.
Is taking me 2 weeks to actually moved in. But I finally spend my first night .
Took a tour with Blane, he was extremely nice, courteous and informative. I look forward to moving into this beautiful property. The staff and amenities are absolutely amazing.
Great experience so far, Chase in Maintenance is amazing and my new home is beautiful! I‚Äôm so grateful for Blane who made this move in so smooth!
What a wonderful place to live‚ù§Ô∏è making friends is so easy here. ALL staff is so friendly, Blane was our leading agent and he made our moving process so easy.
Absolutely love the community, resident events, and amazing staff in the office! 100% a great decision to call The Flats at East Bay home!
I am considering a move and I recently took a tour of the Flats at East Bay. I loved it! There‚Äôs a couple of different apartment layouts that would work well for me and my husband and my dog.
The office staff are amazing and every one here are very sweet.
Went on the best tour! Everyone is so friendly and I can‚Äôt wait to move in
Incredible property. Everyone has been so helpful and friendly, so glad I found this place!
So far everything has been a very smooth process from application to moving in
The design of this place is amazing the staff super helpful!

Great community and leadership team. Maintenance personnel are super friendly, helpful, and always quick in responses/repairs. This morning, I noticed I was missing the valet trash bin. Ms Connie overheard me asking about it; she was already on a job, but I had one at my door within 10 mins. She‚Äôs the best!
Stopped by Flats at East Bay this past weekend. Met with Kasey ‚Äî she was very friendly and super knowledgeable. This is a beautiful community.

The Heights at Picardy.review_text: Still under construction but we‚Äôre almost done and will be open soon, amenities areas are so cool and the rooms are nice as well normal apartment spaces, don‚Äôt know anything about the pricing but it looks pretty.
Has everything you could want. Don't look anywhere else.

The Waters at Bluebonnet.review_text:
Resort-style living in the heart of the city? Yes, please!
We‚Äôre loving it here, not just for the vacation vibes, but for so many thoughtful details:
‚úÖ Approachable, genuinely friendly, and responsive management (special mention to Allison, Maggie, Jacob, Sharon, Michael from Maintenance)
‚úÖ Welcoming neighbors (even the pups are social!)
‚úÖ Gated and well-lit (safe for late-night dog walks
‚úÖ Pool, clubhouse, mailroom & fitness room: all phone-accessed!
‚úÖ Fenced-in dog park = happy pup life
‚úÖ Gorgeous clubhouse (we‚Äôve already enjoyed one fun event and can‚Äôt wait for more)
‚úÖ Our balcony is our cozy retreat
‚úÖ Scenic ponds + aesthetic views = daily ‚Äúahhh‚Äù moments
‚úÖ Free snacks and Starbucks coffee at the Clubhouse (my 11-year-old saw that on our tour and said, ‚ÄúDeal‚Äôs closed. We‚Äôre living here!‚Äù üòÇ)
‚úÖ Costco across the road + fave restaurants nearby
‚úÖ Valet trash pickup = added convenience
‚úÖ And we got to break in brand-new appliances üôå
City living, comfort, and community. üëåüèº So glad to call this place home! ‚ù§Ô∏è

A NEW apartment complex in the community.  I took a tour of the facility and was a little impressed of the amenities more than the space in the apartment. Love the pool area.

Telling it like it IS üòÄ
TerryB ü¶º
Allison was amazing today. She definitely  knew her stuff. Can't wait to make this  place  home... Maggie was also very professional and  friendly.  What a great staff!!!

The front office manager, Jacob he‚Äôs a very nice respectful, young guy and Aaliyah, they are all very respectful. They are so sweet and nice to everyone that comes into the office. The whole office crew is very polite and very manageable and respectful. I speak highly of them. They try their best to help you with any situation that occur on the property and everything with you . I Can say this about the apartment complex it‚Äôs a lovely place to live and the maintenance people be right on time they comes out and fix the problem that you‚Äôve they responded quickly and they‚Äôre very helpful polite
We toured the place and loved it! We applied for a place right after the tour! Highly recommend!
Perfect location and has friendly staff!!

The Waters at Crestview.review_text:
Jordan and Reagan were incredible throughout the entire leasing process. From the very beginning, they were friendly, professional, and always available to answer my questions. They made what can sometimes be a stressful experience feel completely effortless. I truly felt supported every step of the way, and they went above and beyond to make sure everything was handled smoothly.

Thanks to them, as a fellow stoa team member, I felt confident and excited about my decision‚Äîand I‚Äôm so happy to now call this place my new home. I can‚Äôt wait to get settled in! Huge thanks to Jordan and Reagan for making it such a positive experience!

One of the nicest apartment complexes we have toured. The amenities are spacious and first class. The pool area is really nice. The grills are a very nice touch. The apartments are very nice. We love the layout and the appliances are very nice. The welcome gift was a very nice surprise!
Everyone has been really professional and very helpful. Hopefully the team never changes. Joyce you rock üòä. Thank you everyone for all your help!

The Waters at Millerville.review_text: I love living here. I've only been here since Feb but so far my experience has been great. An'Tajha made my move in seamless. She was so courteous and knowledgeable about the apartments and answered all my questions. She stayed with a smile on her face and was a pleasure to talk to.

I started off loving this apartment because they are very nice and maintenance does a great job keeping it clean but when it comes to the office staff when I moved in, I was handed a map and was told to find my apartment so I had to drive around and look for it. They tried to reschedule my move-in time after I paid the movers to be here for a certain time, but we got over that.  A few months later this car came speeding through the parking lot and hit my car head on, and yet they put a sticker on my car in the parking lot in the spot that I pay for telling me that it will be towed because it doesn‚Äôt meet the physical requirements and the car was still driveable. A few months later, I was informed by the courtesy officer that they told him To put the ticket on my car because they rented out the spot that I currently pay for to a new resident without telling me, and without my permission and are still forcing me to move out of the spot for them when it was their mistake. I received no apology!

Maintenance is quick and productive, but I‚Äôm really tired and aggravated with this valet trash. They charge an extra $35 per month, and sometimes the trashman doesn‚Äôt even come. It‚Äôs even worse when they don‚Äôt pick up the trash; they leave the lid open, allowing gnats and other insects to swarm over it. This is a recurring issue. The trash men they hire is always lazy

The Waters apartments is a nice place to stay. I really love it here. The only problem is, to me we starting to get a few bad apples. But the management at this apartment is good. There's this one guy I would like to recognize as VIP of this complex. He is truly the best. Luke thanks for all you do to make our home and community look so dam good. Your positive attitude really means a lot. I most definitely would recommend this place to live.

If you are considering moving here and want a safe, quiet, and friendly environment, look elsewhere. Just to name a few safety issues, tons of the residents here speed through the parking lot going at least 25-30mph nearly causing accidents every day almost running into other cars and even people just walking around. You will be tailgated by other residents if you‚Äôre cruising around the parking lot too slowly. Tons of pet owners will not leash their dogs and will not pick up after them. Their pet waste can be found all over the grass for you or another resident/guest to step in.

The apartment units themselves may look nice on the inside but they seem to be built with cardboards purchased from Temu as there is barely any sound insulation. If you have a neighbor living above you, you will hear EVERYTHING. If someone is having a conversation outside your window, you will feel like you are a part of it and can hear every detail. At night, there is a quiet hours policy but that doesn‚Äôt mean anything. You can call the after hours number to complain but that will not do anything other than sending someone out to tell someone else that they‚Äôre noisy.

My only positive about this place is that their maintenance team is to respond and fix things. Other than that, I would not live here again.

Issues are addressed promptly and I appreciate that, that‚Äôs the most important factor for me when renting. The staff is also very nice and host community events often so it feels like home. I must say, i wasn‚Äôt too pleased when I first moved in but I gave them some time and I‚Äôm glad I did.

I wish I could give 10 stars. The staff was very kind, knowledgeable, answered all questions, and provided a great tour of the property. The ambiance of the property is beyond exceptional and I love the apartment layout. The maintenance team is very professional, prompt, and kind. I feel very safe living here and am looking forward to meeting my neighbors.

I love this property! The management team here is absolutely phenomenal, and the amenities here make it feel like a vacation everyday. I recommend The Waters to anyone that is looking for an upgrade! Schmidt is the one that helped me out, and she was incredibly knowledgeable and really took the time to help me narrow down my perfect home!

My experience as The Waters at Millerville goes beyond my initial expectation.  The thoughtfully designed floor plans sync with a cozy interior, sense of belonging, affords a place that offers a comfy retreat from day-to-day business. It is a well-designed community that gives my life an extra element of appeal. üíï

I have been apartment shopping all over Baton Rouge for a luxury apartment and the tour I received from Schmidt was by FAR the best tour I have taken. Schmidt was VERY informative and knowledgeable. Schmidt was very personable and professional! She is a gem! Thank you Schmidt for an amazing touring experience. The Waters at Millerville is a BEAUTIFUL new property and the amenities are great!
I found my perfect home! Thank you so much for creating such a beautiful place. Also, I'd like to thank Mone for her great assistance. She is absolutely the best!

When I toured this property I knew it was my home, the staff made the process so easy, they kept in touch always there to answer questions and emails, I appreciate everyone at the waters because they literally treat you like family. This apartment complex is amazing very clean and the staff is just simply awesome.

The property is beautiful, pet friendly, and amazing amenities. They management team is so helpful and friendly Elizabeth gave me a tour out the property and absolutely loved her energy. So happy to be apart of the community ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Very friendly place. Looking forward to our stay here. So far we are so happy and love our community. We even have had neighbors welcome us. We are certainly Blessed.

Last week I went and viewed the property and loved it. I loved the size as well as the amenities. HOWEVER, 4 days later, when I went and viewed it with my husband, the price had already gone up by 145.00.
To me that is unacceptable. As a potential tenant, it was a huge red flag because it makes no sense to move in, and a year from now, who knows what it will be.
They stated that the price was based on the market but what market Im unusre. We looked at 4 other apartments on the street and none of them went up.
When I asked the lady she stated that their prices go up every Monday!!! You can definitely tell they are not locally owned.
I saw tons of great 5 star reviews , which made me look but with it being new everyone is nice when you sign up its the after effect that I look at.
Im so glad I caught the price increase on the paperwork she gave me and asked.
AGAIN, staff was nice but whoever owns this place. Hell to the no.

This property is beautiful! The move in process was seamless and easy. Schmidt was super helpful and willing to help throughout this journey. My favorite part so far has been sitting out by the firepit.

It was a pleasure to work with the leasing office and the maintenance team for this property and I recommend these departments, the maintenance departments are honest and the property is clean and in good condition

I rode by the new site and just from what I could see the campus looks absolutely beautiful the color scheme of the light salmon pink color on the building really gives the impression of ‚ÄúLuxury Beach Home‚Äù but it‚Äôs affordable and attainable as an ordinary person looking to rent ! Not to mention I heard the staff was absolutely wonderful and they were so informative idk who she talked to I wanna say his name was Luke or Luca ? Idk but she recommends him if you decide to call for more information on The Water!
The maintenance here is great! Especially Luke he‚Äôs always the one I see doing all the work and he‚Äôs so funny , but also very helpful!
Amazing customer service. Everyone is so nice and helpful. Furthermore, the community is exceptional. This apartment complex is top tier and I am so happy I committed to this community.
Absolutely can‚Äôt wait to move into this property !! Super clean and well kept even with them still working on the property. Staff is amazing and friendly.
The property is absolutely stunning just from the part that is finished. The staff is so polite and eager to help. Highly recommend living here! I‚Äôm so excited!
A great place to call home. Office was nice and very helpful. Shout out to the maintenance crew for keeping the property clean and always going above and beyond !
I love it here! The staff is super nice and hands on, both office and maintenance staff! The area is quiet and everyone is so friendly!
Absolutely beautiful property!! Staff is super helpful with everything, cannot wait to live here:)
A great place to live. The property team is great, friendly, and fast. Property is coming along nicely! 5/5

I am so excited to live here!! the property is still under construction but i‚Äôve went & looked at it in person and it is so gorgeous!! the staff at millerville is astronomical!! i cant wait to see what the waters at millerville brings !!ü´∂üèº
The property looks amazing and the staff is wonderful! Shoutout to Luke for being so respective and helpful.
Very affordable, super clean, maintenance crew is amazing and quick to respond. The office employees are super sweet as well.
The new Waters at Millerville property looks amazing even while still being under construction! The staff is extremely kind and helpful.
Gorgeous property! The staff were both friendly and so informative!
Very affordable, beautiful property, everything was super tidy . Employees in the office were very helpful . Highly recommend
I am so excited to finally be moved in and I  am so thankful for Schmidt‚Äôs help!  She went well above her job to help us!

Great office staff  they are  friendly.
I recommend. the waters  at Millerville.
office  staff and the maintenance  team they do great  job
Beautiful community and great staff!!! The amenities are terrific and apartments look great.
Beautiful & spacious floor plans. The leasing office is very polite and helpful
Beautiful property! Loved the awesome staff and incredible amenities!!
These luxury apartments look great!! You have got to see them. They are a must have üòä
This community is amazing! Luke is very professional and outstanding!
Great location and beautiful apartments! You can‚Äôt go wrong living here!
The property is absolutely stunning & the staff is wonderful, so polite!
Gorgeous property, and the staff make you feel like family!
Wonderful staff, beautiful & clean property. Glad there's one finally in BR.
The property looks great!! Staff is amazing & helpful!
Such a beautiful apartment and all the staff is very helpful!
Property is beautiful and the staff are amazing, friendly and super helpful!
Super helpful staff and friendly environment. Highly recommended. Luke was great help!
A beautiful property with awesome amenities and super friendly staff.
Great Knowledgeable, and Polite Staff! Apartments, grounds and amenities are immaculate!
Beautiful property! Elizabeth in the office is wonderful!
Beautiful community! Office staff is super friendly and helpful.
Schmidt has got to be my favorite employee. She‚Äôs super helpful.
Absolutely beautiful property,the staff is amazing!
I can‚Äôt wait to move in! They area is pretty and so close to everything! My family can‚Äôt wait!
Absolutely stunning property and I love the employees !
The property looks great and the staff was very helpful
Elizabeth is great made my home finding as easy and enjoyable as it should be!!!
It is spectacular, it has good comfort, it is excellent, I would recommend it.
Everything is beautiful and the staff's friendliness is excellent.
Love this place! I toured with Schmidt, and she was wonderful!
This is a beautiful property that has amazing staff
The property is gorgeous and the staff is amazing.
The property looks great. Luke was awsome
When considering a place to call home, the waters should be top of your list!
This property looks great and the staff is amazing.
clean property and the staff is top notch.
This place is very nice. You must see it to believe it.
Amazing property and amazing staff!
Elizabeth was so polite and welcoming!!
Luke is reliable and supportive‚Ä¶
The property looks great and the staff was amazing.

This place is pretty cool.
Management team is amazing!!
Highly recommend

(Translated by Google) Excellent, I love them üòä

(Original)
Excelente me encantan üòä

The Waters at Redstone.review_text: I spoke with a lady named Veronica. She was extremely helpful. I‚Äôm looking at moving across the country to live in Florida again and this is the area I settled on. She was very insightful and was willing to explain above and beyond just the housing at these apartments but the surrounding area as well giving me insight into what is nearby for shopping and entertainment and included information that would help my dog adjust to the area as well

Everyone is so friendly.  Including the residents and the leasing office ladies, Kimberly, Tiffani and Veronica helped our move in be seamless. Hunter and the rest of the maintenance team are amazing. They even installed new fire alarms with lights for my fianc√© who is deaf. Tiffani made sure before we moved to have all the important paperwork for the accommodation to be filled out. Amazing people!
I just moved here two days ago. I chose this place because I truly love it. At the moment, I have nothing negative to say.

First off, rent here is ridiculously high. A one bed room half the size of a New York studio shouldn‚Äôt cost nobody 1200+. A one bed room at minimum if you‚Äôre going to make it pricey should be at least 1,000-1,100. Also, the carports being $60 dollars a month is DIABOLICALLY RIDICULOUSüò≠üòÇ on top of your rent?! C‚Äômon now. I want to also point out, be on top of your P&Q‚Äôs if you‚Äôre going to let 3rd party companies work on the complex/ community. Also, no refunds is nasty work(especially if you guys mess up on your end.. unintentionally though) I understand things do happen. Also, the stair cases stained with dog piss and the community filled with dog doodoo is bafflingüíÄ. Please have somebody pressure wash the place or something. You guys preach how you want the community to look clean, but yet it‚Äôs not‚Ä¶ at all. Plus the whole smart lock thing, why charge more on people‚Äôs rent for that? We already paying thousands dollars a year. That should be free lmao. Like what? I‚Äôm just trying to give tips that‚Äôs all. Other than that, I love the fact that there are community events!!!! Veronica is the the most sweetest person I know!!! That‚Äôs my little bestie üòÇü´∂üèæ  I also would recommend a basketball court! That would be so TUFF!!!!! The pool great addition bc it‚Äôs hot. People here are friendly & I love the maintenance team.

My wife and I moved in about a month ago and it has been nothing but one positive after another. We love the amenities and location of the apartments. In 1 day, we can go to the store, the pharmacy and out to eat and only travel a total of 2 miles. Our beagle loves the area and feels right at home

I love this place thanks to the exceptional efforts of all the staff here, especially Veronica, Ava, Tiffani, and Don. From the moment I moved in, Veronica and Ava have been a beacon of professionalism and kindness, always ensuring that any concerns are addressed promptly and efficiently. Don‚Äôs attention to detail and commitment to maintaining the property in pristine condition has made living here an absolute pleasure. Tiffani's warm and welcoming demeanor has created a sense of community that truly makes this place feel like home.

The fun community events organized by the team are the cherry on top. There is always something exciting happening to bring residents together. These events not only provide entertainment but also foster a strong sense of community among neighbors.

Together, these outstanding individuals and the vibrant community events have transformed the complex into a haven of comfort and enjoyment. Highly recommended!

The Waters at Redstone has a resort-like feel and the hospitality they show is one of a kind. I will always be recommending these apartments to those looking for an affordable place to call home. The amazing amenities they have are nothing like I‚Äôve seen before. The leasing consultants are so very sweet and down to earth. The maintenance men are all always willing to lend a helping hand.
If you or anyone you know is looking for a place to call home, give The Waters at Redstone a call.

The Waters at Redstone has been an excellent living experience for both me and my cat Arlo.

I moved into the Waters a few months ago as one of their first tenants and they have been nothing but hospitable and excellent the entire time. Regularly they will host small parties with excellent food and drink that offer great opportunities to meet new people and mingle with your neighbors.

The maintenance staff is very helpful and even helped me when I was in a jam moving furniture (Big shoutout to Ronald). The rest of the staff is awesome as well!

Ava helped me immensely in my leadup to moving in often answering questions over email in a few minutes and always happy to provide me with information at a moments notice, this was great for me as a first apartment experience.

Veronica has helped me several times with questions in regards to billing and even helped me get set up with my mobile device applications very quickly.

Tiffany is an excellent community manager. Her and the rest of her team exude hospitality and I have never felt like a nuisance with even the most trivial of questions. Tiffany even offered to help me resolve some issues with FPL on a moments notice.

The staff at Redstone is fantastic, always asking me how I am doing and being genuinely invested in their tenants. I would strongly recommend this apartment to anyone interested.

The amenities are also excellent with a fully stocked gym, pool, and self service Starbucks coffee machine. This place is very luxurious at  a very reasonable price.

I have enjoyed the entire rental experience with Redstone. They have been extremely helpful and professional from the tour, move in, and living here. The amenities are extremely nice and clean. I would recommend this community to anyone who is looking for a new apartment home.

I absolutely love this the staff here. I go in the office everyday to see Veronica, Ava, and Tiffani before work. They also have smiling faces and are enjoyable to talk to. Definitely recommended this complex to my coworkers!

I really wish I could give more than five stars, from the moment I walked in I immediately knew this was home. I was treated so well and every single person that works there is so kind, helpful, and courteous. I felt so comfortable and happy to be there. Even my kids were absolutely welcome in and treated so good! Deciding to live here was the best decision I've made without a doubt.

Great community and love the amenities; however, finding parking in the evening is getting ridiculous. Sure, you can buy a car port but that‚Äôs if there‚Äôs even one available for the unit you live in. One night I had to park two buildings across from me due to lack of parking.
This community is great. Staff are so helpful and it‚Äôs peaceful here. Free dog treats and community events. Nice.
While giving the tour, Ava was very kind and helpful! I loved her energy and she was very personable. At the end, we got these cute popcorn gift bags! Wonderful atmosphere and a wonderful staff!
Amazing apartments with incredibly friendly, helpful team members. Special shout out to Veronica and Ava for making my move in experience so welcoming and personable!

This place is beautiful inside and outside. Located in one of the best spots I‚Äôve seen so far in the area. The Staff is very professional and friendly. And the apartment has all the luxury you need without breaking the bank. I am very thankful to have found this place and I love my apartment.

This is the standard of apartments. Definitely the best apartments in Crestview and possibly all of Okaloosa County. Living here makes me never want to move again. Everyone is so friendly and it doesn't even feel like apartments. I feels like a resort!
Fantastic experience. All questions answered in a timely manner and was able to get moved in exactly when I wanted! We love the dog park and the pool!

Happy with the experience since day one üòä
Community orientated with wonderful staff. Amenities are sweet and got to use the grill for the first time this evening.
Everyone is very professional and friendly.   They have answered all our questions and ensured our relocation went smoothly.   We are loving the office and maintenance teams and the new community.
absolutely the best staff hands down, Ava and Veronica are very friendly since day one, are always super helpful and get things done quick ! I love it here
Ava helped us so much and was very kind. She answered any questions we had even though we came in like 10 times lol
Great place to live 10/10 recommend! They love military and take care of me and my wife!
It‚Äôs amazing! Y‚Äôall should totally check it , great people , deals and just overall great environment!
Beautiful community.  A beautiful home. Must see in person.
This place has cheap walls cheap wood but rents expensive make since of that?!

The Waters at Settlers Trace.review_text: Only been here two days, but this place is great. For one, obviously, because it's all new, but the layout of the apartment we are in is awesome. It's all up-to-date, modern design and right next to grocery stores and many other stores. The price is about what you'd expect for an apartment in Lafayette, especially in a nice area. Management is very helpful to us, which you won't find at many apartment complexes, I hope it stays this way. There is the issue of residents leaving trash outside of the compactor which is rude, especially considering these are brand new. I have yet to live in an apartment as great as this one is.

I am going to be really honest. I have been living here since the end of March. With the recent transfer of The Waters from being managed by Stoa Group to now Greystar, I am highly concerned the quality is going to go down. Right now, I do not think I will renew my lease because of all the management changes and not to mention how many times their fire alarm company needs to be on property. They needed to do work all day on June 9th and now they need to do more work on July 10th? It's the biggest hassle to be disturbed when you are paying a premium price (1500+) for an apartment. I guess we will see how this goes, but I don't think the quality is going to get any better. If anything, worse. It's like any apartment management company really, they just care about your money.

We were looking for apartments for my sister in law and called the office for some information but huge mistake!! Receptionist were very sharp on answering and we set an appointment for today at 1 but she just hang out without even asking for our names. So we deleted this place on our apartment complex list üò°üò°üò°

Living at the Waters at Settlers Trace has been an incredible experience! The apartments are modern, spacious, and filled with thoughtful touches like the stainless steel appliances and large windows with natural light. The community amenities are exceptional: a sparkling pool, fully equipped gym, and peaceful, spacious lounge areas.

The management team is friendly, professional, and quick to respond to any concerns, which makes living here stress-free. My Wife, Victoria, loves working for the STOA group. Maintenance is always efficient and resolves issues promptly.

The location is ideal, with easy access to restaurants, Target, and just making life even more convenient. The neighborhood feels safe, clean, and welcoming, with friendly neighbors and plenty of green spaces to enjoy.

I highly recommend the Waters at Settlers Trace to anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and hassle-free place to live! It truly feels like a home of your own.

Avoid moving into any of the buildings behind the Whole Foods shopping center. Every night around 2 a.m., the garbage collectors come through and it‚Äôs extremely loud. I‚Äôve reported it, but they said there‚Äôs nothing they can do. My baby and I get woken up every single night because of it. Other than that, I really love my apartment it‚Äôs just the nightly noise:(
Relaxed environment, staff is great and really go above and beyond to keep this place up. Really enjoy living here, amenities are top notch n

Me and my husband just got our welcome home letter today and we can't wait to move in soon. Everyone has been so friendly, helpful, and very welcoming! The property itself is beautiful and we can't wait to make it our home.

Our first tour was awesome, Grant was super informative and answered all questions we had. The amenities and atmosphere made this place feel like a community we wanted to live in! At the end of the tour Grant gave us all the information we needed to move forward and even told us where to set up electricity and cable which was super helpful coming from out of state.  So far we have settled in nicely and cant wait to go to community events in the future! 10/10!

My move-in experience has been wonderful! I‚Äôve gotten support from a few of the maintenance guys, and they were so friendly and helpful! It kind of feels like living at a resort, which is right up my alley!

This place is incredible the staff is amazing Erika the leasing agent was very knowledgeable and professional and willing to work with you to get you the home you deserve .Once I moved in I had a couple of maintenance issues that where take care of immediately..I was quite impressed
Just moved in. Friendly staff.... Loving the view from my balcony And the openness of the living area inside of my apartment. Very spacious for a one bedroom apartment.

The Waters at West Village.review_text:
My experience at The Waters at West Village began on a positive note, but it quickly turned into a nightmare. I moved into a brand-new apartment that had never been occupied before. However, within just two months, the vinyl tile floors started coming up. At first, it wasn‚Äôt too serious, but by October, I submitted a maintenance request. The team attempted to fix the issue by gluing the floors down, but it only worsened, especially in my bedroom.
As the flooring continued to lift, creating a serious tripping hazard, I submitted another maintenance request and invited the leasing manager to see the problem in person. She declined my invitation, citing the need to sort Christmas decorations. This dismissal made me feel neglected and unimportant. Instead, she promised to come by the following Monday, which coincided with Thanksgiving week. I explained that I had family coming over and was concerned about the safety risk. When she finally arrived, she acknowledged the problem, saying it would only take a day to fix. She also asked if I wanted  to switch to a different unit. However, since it was during holiday season and my apartment was fully furnished and decorated, I preferred to stay, provided the floors could be repaired.
Despite explaining the urgency of the situation to her supervisor, I was left waiting for months with no resolution. What followed was a series of unprofessional delays, poor communication, and a complete lack of accountability. Though promises were made that the issue would be handled quickly, the floors weren‚Äôt repaired for over four months. Both the leasing manager and the property management team failed to follow up or provide any clarity when I repeatedly asked about the next steps as the floors were getting worse. I even inquired about moving to a different unit, specifically one facing the pond, but was told there were none available. They assured me that the repairs would be quick, but there was no clear plan in place.
In January 2025, I was finally informed that moisture tests would be conducted in my apartment on January 14th and that the replacement floors were on back order. After the tests were completed, they wanted to swiftly schedule the floor repairs, but once again, no concrete plan was provided when I asked how would the moving in and out  of my items would go and who would be financially responsible for packing materials. I was told that the property management team had never handled repairs in an occupied unit before and was unsure how to proceed. After months of living with hazardous floors, I sought legal help to address my concerns. By this point, I had developed an upper respiratory infection and had been to the ER, where I was diagnosed after weeks of persistent coughing and mucus.
Despite enduring months of living with unsafe floors, I was only offered partial rent credits for the time I couldn‚Äôt live comfortably in my apartment. I was also lied to about the moisture test, and the company ignored my lawyer‚Äôs requests for information. Once the floors were finally repaired, I asked for the underlying issues to be addressed to ensure my peace of mind, but my concerns were once again ignored.
What is most disappointing is how little the management team seemed to care about my actual living experience. They were more focused on hosting resident events and posting about them on social media than on maintaining a safe, comfortable, and respectful living environment. Though my floors were eventually repaired, the fundamental issues, as seen in the photos, were never properly tested or addressed, leaving me feeling unsafe in my own home.

**UPDATE**
SEE THIER YELP PAGE FOR MY COMPLETE REPONSE
The total disregard for my safety and the dismissal of my concerns after the tile was removed proves you could care less about a more positive living experience for my family and I. The new floors were swiftly put down without testing those spots for potential health hazards and that is extremely concerning.
